Title: Apple Settles Siri Privacy Lawsuit: Are You Eligible for a Payment?
Summary: Apple settled a class action lawsuit for $95 million over user privacy violations related to Siri recordings. Users may be eligible for a payment as a result of the settlement.
Key Takeaways: Apple settled a lawsuit for $95 million over Siri privacy violations.; Users impacted by the violation may be entitled to a payment.; The settlement highlights concerns over user privacy and data protection.

Title: Apple makes CFO transition official as Luca Maestri departs role
Summary: Apple has made the CFO transition official as Luca Maestri departs from the role in 2025. The company issued a report to investors regarding Maestri's transition.
Key Takeaways: Luca Maestri is stepping down from the CFO position at Apple in 2025.; Investors have been informed about Maestri's transition through a report issued by Apple.

Title: Zuckerberg is cashing in on Meta’s record stock price with fresh share sales
Summary: Mark Zuckerberg, the founder and CEO of Meta Platforms Inc. (formerly Facebook), sold shares of the company at a record stock price. The sale was disclosed in regulatory filings.
